DODGE DRIVE

  • Genre: Spherical world and high score based game.

  • Tech Stack: Unity, Blender, Audacity.

  • Programming Language: C#.

  • Project Status: Shipped.

  • Addons: Shield, Score multiplier.

LASER DEFENDER

  • Laser Defender is a 2D space shooter game prototype.

  • It is made with basic concepts of game development (Unity 3D) like instantiating and animating 2D sprites.

  • I made this game by following the Udemy's Unity 3D course and I improved this prototype further by adding few things like procedural level generation, increasing difficulty as the player progresses, high score system.

  • You can get the course here! I really recommend this course for all beginners.

  • Click here! to get this project from GitHub.

  • Glitch Garden is a 2D strategy game (clone of plants vs zombies) and is also from Unity 3D course.

  • I improved this prototype by implementing Raycasting, difficulty, procedural level generation and I made this game prototype complete android portable.

  • Click here! to get this project from GitHub.

GOLD GUARDIAN

  • Gold Guardian is a 2D pixel art strategy survival game.

  • I created all the assets for this game on my own using Matmoset Hexels (tried pixel art for the first time).

  • It is a single level survival game. Spawning of gold piles in the game is completely procedural for every new game.

  • Use of concepts like Raycasting, sprite animation, particle system, pixel arts and OOP.

  • Spawning of enemies (goblins) is completely dependent on the position of gold piles and they first target the nearest unoccupied gold pile.

  • Game is still under development!

Game 1 of 10 in Mini Games

  • It is a 2D action shooter game.

  • The main objective of the game is to survive and stop the incoming helicopter attacks.

  • Use of concepts like physics collisions, laws of motion, GUI, Raycasting and 2D sprites.

  • It is infinitely running high score based game and the status of the game is completed (add-ons may get added in the future).

Game 2 of 10 in Mini games

  • It is simple 2D survival game.

  • The goal of the player is to survive the road rash. The spawning of the vehicles is completely procedural.

  • Use of concepts like particle system, sprite animations and OOP.

  • It is infinitely running game and the status of the game is completed.

Game 3 of 10 in Mini games

  • It is 2D infinitely running action survival game.

  • The goal of the player is to survive the incoming missles. Spawned missiles will target and chase the player.

  • Use of concepts like vector calculus, physics collisions, laws of motion, OOP, particle systems and sound editing (sound editing is done using Audacity).

  • The status of the game is almost completed and need some addons.

    • *** Rest of the games of Mini Games Collection is yet to be started.

PIN STRIKE

  • Pin Strike is a 2D infinitely running game and it is a clone of famous andriod game "AA".

  • I made this game under 30 minutes, as I was challenged to do a fully functional game within a given time :)

  • Use of concepts like vectors, physics collisions. The game is not completed 100% but it is fully functional.
